attributes.action: Stop Nigel Farage and Ukip getting involved and rushing article 50
attributes.additional_details: We are worried about the plans to rush brexit by the right wing and far right nearly half the country voted remain too and are worried already of the affects of when or if we brexit and has no pans and we would just plunge the uk into darkness if sign too quick without plans and give in to the far right people who seem desperate
attributes.background: Think that rushing brexit without plans is wrong and right wing are so despearate for it to happen . 48 percent of people voted remain and we could be in so much trouble pushing the article 50 with no plans

rejection.details: If you would like the Government to wait until a certain date before invoking article 50, or wait until certain conditions are met, then you could start a new petition calling for that. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
